body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping          Everyone needs good food and good night's rest while on holiday! While White Sands doesn't have a hotel or café within the park, we do offer primitive backcountry camping in the heart of the dunes. The nearby towns of Alamogordo and Las Cruces have many popular lodging choices and restaurants. You'll also find many RV and vehicle camping options in the surrounding areas.
title: White Sands National Monument: Eating & Sleeping
